price: 31. Ee tuur ushaada. Markiise uu arkay iyadoo dhaq-dhaqaaqaysa oo la moodo mas, buu isgaddiyey, mana soo dhugan gadaal. (Waxaa la yidhi): Muusow! Kaalay soo dhowow, hana cabsan, adigu waxaad tahay mid ka mid ah kuwa aaminka ah (nabad geli).
arabic: وَأَنۡ أَلۡقِ عَصَاكَۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهَا تَهۡتَزُّ كَأَنَّهَا جَآنّٞ وَلَّىٰ مُدۡبِرٗا وَلَمۡ يُعَقِّبۡۚ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ أَقۡبِلۡ وَلَا تَخَفۡۖ إِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأٓمِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-an alqi ʿaṣāka falammā raāhā tahtazzu ka-annahā jānnun wallā mud'biran walam yuʿaqqib yāmūsā aqbil walā takhaf innaka mina al-āminīna
